name: Misty One-Shot
description:
This is the One-Shot for the fun, sweet, and energetic mixed berry recipe Misty. Notes of strawberry, raspberry, blueberry, and boysenberry.

Pick up Misty here:
(US) -- https://diyordie.link/misty-atf
(UK/EU) -- https://diyordie.link/misty-atf-uk

Flavor & Recipe Development Notes:
https://diyordie.link/misty-atf-recipe
author: ENYAWREKLAW
